info.+content: Rai wakes up from 820-years long sleep and starts his new life as a student in a high school founded by his loyal servant, Frankenstein. But his peaceful days with other human students are soon interrupted by mysterious attackers known as the "Unions". (from manga)

title.+content: The Girl I`m Into Is a Noble
That All May Be as It Should Be
